summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous resolutions on Iraq, particularly 1500 (2003) and 1546 (2004),
Reaffirming Iraq's independence, sovereignty, unity and territorial integrity,
Recalling the establishment of UNAMI on 14 August 2003 to assist in forming representative government institutions,
Welcoming the Secretary-General's new Special Representative for Iraq,
Considering the Secretary-General's report of 5 August 2004 (S/2004/625),
Decides to extend UNAMI's mandate for 12 months; 
Expresses intention to review UNAMI's mandate in 12 months or sooner if requested by the Iraqi Government;
Decides to remain seized of the matter.
